channel.title: Humanitarian on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Humanitarian on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Humanitarian Aid and Disaster Relief
item.description:
What you can do

  • Needs assessments and distributions
  • Site mapping and shelter planning
  • Monitoring, reporting, and coordination

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Share projects with agencies securely and keep everyone aligned.

item.title: QField for Refugee Camp and Shelter Mapping
item.description:
Field workflows

  • Shelter and service inventories
  • Site planning and allocation
  • Protection and safety mapping

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare projects in QGIS and collaborate via QFieldCloud even in challenging contexts.
